Interface ISContex

  • All Superinterfaces:

    public interface ISContex
extends de.ityx.contex.interfaces.designer.IServerContex
    see ICContex
    How to use:
    API.getServerAPI().getContexAPI().storeMaster(con, daten);

                                    Filter filter,

                                    Project project)

        Parameters:
        con - connection of database
        filter - a given Filter
        question - a given question
        project - a project to find a master with name equals a project name

        A List of FilterContexModes

      • storeSubprojectMapping

        boolean storeSubprojectMapping(Connection con,
                             Subproject subproject)
                               throws SQLException
        Stores the Subproject as Mapping with the equivalent table [ in this case,,teilprojekt,, ]
        in the database. This mean that a subproject Object represents a data row in
        the table and the columns are the Object's attribute
        Parameters:
        con - connection of database
        subproject - Subproject to store
        Returns:
        true if a subproject was stored
        Throws:
        SQLException
        was:
        storeTPMapping

      • resumeProcess

        boolean resumeProcess(String procesname,
                    Long processId,
                    String unitName,
                    String name)
        Executes a contex process with given name from contex master again or create new contex process with given id
        Parameters:
        procesname - name of a process
        processId - id of a process
        unitName - unit name of a unit of mediatrix
        name - name name of master
        Returns:
        true if a process was executed normal
